channel.title: Full Stack on Uday | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Full Stack on Uday | Portfolio

item.title: Vendor-Job Marketplace Platform
item.description: Built a marketplace platform that connects service vendors with job opportunities, featuring real-time matching, Supabase backend, and AI-assisted development with Lovable.

item.title: HR Vendor Management Portal
item.description: Built a modern vendor management platform for HR departments using Next.js and v0.dev, featuring automated workflows, document management, and integrated communication channels.

item.title: Modular AI Platform with Supabase & Hugging Face
item.description: Developed a flexible, modular platform that combines the power of modern LLMs with robust backend infrastructure, enabling rapid prototyping and deployment of AI applications.
